abstracts.cdata!:
The project is designed to assist the
            Government in the construction of the Edea-Yaounde section
            of the Douala-Yaounde road; other objectives are to provide
            technical assistance to improve the management of the
            transport sector, and to help prepare a national transport
            plan and future projects. The project would consist of the
            following main components: (i) construction of the
            Edea-Yaounde section of the Douala-Yaounde road; (ii)
            supervision of construction of the Edea-Yaounde section;
            (iii) technical assistance to the Ministry of Equipment and
            the Ministry of Transport and fellowships for Cameroonian
            staff; (iv) strengthening of the National Civil Works
            Laboratory including provision of technical assistance and
            fellowships; and (v) preinvestment studies to improve
            national transport planning and maintenance of the paved
            road network.
